title: 【求教】服务器经常崩溃问题
author: wy2677336
txt_content:
问一下
自己的服务器会这样崩溃，提示信息如下，想问下怎么回事





QQ截图20120523113335.png (110.67 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2012-5-23 11:31 上传






2012-05-23 05:01:13 [SEVERE] java.net.SocketException: Socket closed
2012-05-23 05:01:13 [INFO] Connection reset
2012-05-23 05:01:13 [SEVERE]         at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(Unknown Source)
2012-05-23 05:01:13 [INFO] Antics lost connection: disconnect.overflow
2012-05-23 05:01:13 [SEVERE]         at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(Unknown Source)
2012-05-23 05:01:13 [SEVERE]         at java.io.BufferedOutputStream.flushBuffer(Unknown Source)
2012-05-23 05:01:13 [SEVERE]         at java.io.BufferedOutputStream.flush(Unknown Source)
2012-05-23 05:01:13 [SEVERE]         at java.io.DataOutputStream.flush(Unknown Source)
2012-05-23 05:01:13 [SEVERE]         at net.minecraft.server.NetworkWriterThread.run(SourceFile:103)

replies.author: jesse
replies.txt_content: 据说是无影响的连接丢失

replies.author: Tototiger
replies.txt_content:
socket 丢失连接，这个估计是你网络问题，时断时续，我也不是很清楚了。
LZ经常在什么的情况下会这样？

replies.author: 风障
replies.txt_content:
骚年···
你的服务端不是纯净的吧
下个纯净的自己弄吧
